channel.title: [PI] NPC Giving Item Once
channel.description: It's the holiday season soon and I want to make Santa, anyway I got the dialogues and him giving items. But does anyone know how to make it so you can only receive it once from him? So people won't spam click and get items.

item.title: [PI] NPC Giving Item Once
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx

Download Eclipse IDE then, makes you’re life 100000X easier,

item.description:

case 1552: c.getDH().sendDialogues(100, npcType); if (c.santaPrize == 0) { c.getItems().addItem(995,1); } else if(c.santaPrize == 1) { c.sendMessage("Greedy Fuck, You Got Your "ITEM" Already."); break;

item.title: [PI] NPC Giving Item Once
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Put something like this in player.java

And this

else if (token.equals("santaItem")) { p.santaPrize = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

And In playersave.java This

characterfile.write("santaItem = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.santaItem), 0, Integer.toString(p.santaItem).length()); characterfile.newLine();

And then add something like this in actionhandler which the npc case and stuff its easy but I cba to explain

[code=java] if(c.santaPrize == 0) {
c.getItems().addItem(ID,Amount);

		if(c.santaPrize == 1) {

c.sendMessage(“Stop Being Greedy, You Got Your “ITEM” Already.”);[/code]

Read full topic
